import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; import { headerService } from "../services/HeaderServices"; const HeaderComponent = () => { const settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 3000, }; const {Da} = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchProducts = async () => { try { const fectedProduct = await headerService(); setProduct(fectedProduct); if (componentRef.current) { componentRef.current.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); // Cuộn lên đầu trang } } catch (err) { console.error(err); } }; fetchProducts(); }, [idCate, id]); return (
